doc.title: Jatt Da Gandasa
doc.plot: Widowed after her husband, Jaildhara, was brutally murdered in front of her eyes by Choudhary Durjan Singh, Mrs. Jaildhara vows to bring up her two sons, Jeeto and Jagga, with one motive - avenge their father's death. When both grow up, she finds out that Jeeto is in love with Durjan's daughter, and even if she convinces him to take up arms against his prospective father-in-law, the two brothers must face-off against not only Durjan and his men but also his six sons.
